titleStmt.title: Xth Syriac Symposium VIIIth Conference of Christian Arabic Studies Granada 22-27 September 2008

analytic.title: Xth Syriac Symposium VIIIth Conference of Christian Arabic Studies Granada 22-27 September 2008

projectDesc.p: Hugoye: Journal of Syriac Studies is an electronic journal dedicated to the study of the Syriac tradition, published semi-annually (in January and July) by Beth Mardutho: The Syriac Institute. Published since 1998, Hugoye seeks to offer the best scholarship available in the field of Syriac studies.

revisionDesc.change: File created by XSLT transformation of original HTML encoded article.

body.p: [1] The Xth Syriac Symposium and the VIIIth conference on Christian Arab Studies will take place in Granada, Spain from Monday, September 22 to Saturday, September 27, 2008, hosted by the International Center for the Study of the Christian Orient.

[2] The dead line for submitting communications is on the 15th of July 2008 and should be emailed to symposium08@icsco.org. (To allow for organizing the provisional program, a summary of a maximum of 10 lines was expected by the 30th April 2008.) The presentations should not exceed 20 minutes with an additional 10 minutes for questions.

Ignacio Carbajosa
Facultad de Teología "San Dámaso"
c/ Jerte, 10
28005 Madrid (Spain)
+34 913644010
